name: Heavens: Serenity - Transient Descend
description:
Dive into the world of Aegius, year 4610. Mankind has long ceased, Nature has evolved to take its place. The animals we once knew has evolved be to become intelligent enough to create their own civilization, living in peace and harmony. In such a world, there once was a country that was lush and green, surrounded by mountains and rivers flowing in between. Enter Ziong Huo~

Jiangzhou, a young male dragon, a soldier in the grade A military of Zionghuo. He is known for his strength and wisdom throughout the country. Known as the "The Hero", he has accomplished many feats here. Danger comes, he valiantly fights it off. But the king has died to a disease, and now its starting to spread from the north. The princess, the heir to the king has set out to put an end to this disease without telling anyone anything else than it, and she is nowhere to be found. It is said that the disease is spreading from a monster. Which added to the already existing fear, everyone started panicking in a once peaceful continent. When they need them the most,  The Hero, commander Shuijing, Master Shaoyun and Voyager Tiangheng will rise. But will fate of the East guide them to eternal peace? Be the Azure dragon, and keep an eye over all of our heroes through the eyes of Jiangzhou~
